children.name: Authors
desc: The total number of people who submitted issues.

children.name: Changed issues 1 week
desc: The number of issues on the project updated during last week.

children.name: Changed issues 1 month
desc: The number of issues on the project updated during last month.

children.name: Changed issues 1 year
desc: The number of issues on the project updated during last year.

children.name: Created issues 1 week
desc: The number of issues on the project created during last week.

children.name: Created issues 1 month
desc: The number of issues on the project created during last month.

children.name: Created issues 1 year
desc: The number of issues on the project created during last year.

children.name: Total number of issues
desc: The total number of issues submitted on the project.

children.name: Total number of closed issues
desc: The number of closed issues on the project at the time of analysis.

children.name: Total number of open issues
desc: The number of closed issues on the project at the time of analysis.

children.name: Total number of late issues
desc: The number of issues on the project which due date has already past at the time of analysis.

children.name: Total number of non-assigned open issues
desc: The number of issues on the project which are open and not assigned to anybody.

children.name: ACTORS
desc: The total number of people involved in issues tracking, includes authors (submitters), closers and updaters XXX.
